website_summaries.verdict: Pick from 4 color options with this basic shaker bottle that is offered at a very low price point.
pros: Works well for protein shakes, as it includes a polypropylene mixer ball to deliver a shake that tastes great
capacity, which allows for creating big drinks
Lower cost versus other shaker bottles
cons: Mixer ball may not last as long as a metal version would

customer_reviews.title: said it works better than most
customer_reviews.text: my son has tried numerous shaker bottles, with wires and spooly tops...you name it. He actually likes this one, said it works better than most. He makes protein shakes where the powder layer is about the same size as the milk, so it has to do the job of combining the two. Will be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Chic

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy already. Right on time delivery, clean quality product for a DECENT price. Way to go! I would highly recommend 😉
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this bottle for 4 months and it started becoming more and more leaky. Kept it for a while after it started leaking last month but had to get rid of it since it leaked in my bag with my laptop in it :( Great bottle while it lasted though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa_

customer_reviews.title: Last night as i was shaking up my protein the ...
customer_reviews.text: Last night as i was shaking up my protein the top actually cracked where the bottle screws on. Cheap design and poorly made product! Do your self a favor and spend a little more money and go for a blender bottle or something equivalent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker bottle for a good price !
customer_reviews.text: This shaker bottle is just what i needed. The plastic is not flimsy and the mixing ball's design helps mix all your protein powder thoroughly. I would highly recommend this shaker cup due to its cheap price and good design and function.
customer_reviews.author: kmpballer

customer_reviews.title: Great container for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great container for the price. I turned around and bought a few more after I got my first order.
customer_reviews.author: David Hansen

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first shaker bottle. And it didn't really do the job of mixing the protein all together. I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mikka Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They're great no spills or leaks. Personally I didn't like the ball so I replaced it with one from another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift & he really loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift & he really loves it. It's really a quality shaker for a low price & he loves the silicone ball.
customer_reviews.author: KEAH P

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, tight seals, love the shaker ball it comes with!
customer_reviews.author: KrispyJo.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks terribly
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for awhile, started to leak from the lid more and more until I threw it away. Don’t waste money on this Shaker bottle knockoff. Trash product
customer_reviews.author: Bryan G

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: After just a few uses it is not watertight... shaking it up water leaks between the lid and bottle in the threaded part. Pay a little more to save you a lot of clean up.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Came in nice packaging. And it is a nice bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Cdm1612

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shaker!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Like this shaker. Easy to clean. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Came with a tiny little crack in the side.
customer_reviews.text: Came with an almost invisible little 3cm crack in the side. Sort of defeated the purpose of buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic, No Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on the lid chipped and shattered on the first usage. I only use it as a water cup for my work desk, now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Simenson

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: Mixes drink pretty well, and the cap stays on tight.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonB

product_meta.title: BOTTLED JOY Protein Shaker Bottle, Non-Toxic Wide Mouth 100% Leak Proof Shake Water Bottles 27oz 800ml (Zipper Black)
